Algorithm.name: EstGLDAInflow
Algorithm.Comment:
Computes the Powell inflow from the three upstream gages and a side inflow coefficient. If any gages are missing, estimates inflow using mass balance and an assumed delta bankstorage coefficient.
This algorithm does not actually write to delta bank storage, but the resulting estimated inflow will result in a delta bank storage that matches the value used here.
Inputs: bffu = San Juan River at Bluff clru = Colorado River at Cisco grvu = Green River at Green River, UT evap = Powell Evaporation delta_storage = Powell change in storage total_release = Powell total release volume
Output: inflow = Powell total inflow
